text: New Tornado Watch issued in Texas as severe storms barrel across South New Tornado Watch issued in Texas as severe storms barrel across South | Latest Weather Clips | FOX Weather A new Tornado Watch was issued in Texas, … [FOX Weather](/@FOXWeather) flipped this story into [FOX Weather Latest Video](/@foxweather/fox-weather-latest-video-5lvae1mfz)•2h More stories from [Weather](/topic/weather) More stories from [Tornadoes](/topic/tornado) [Tornadoes tear through Tennessee](/topic/tornado/tornadoes-tear-through-tennessee/a-Gy49jU94ROKDEQGsM2DUZA%3Aa%3A3483438980-2b185337ea%2Fflipboard.com) A large part of the South must clean up after severe weather left three dead in Tennessee and North Carolina on Wednesday. Multiple businesses and homes in Spring Hill just south of Nashville were damaged in the storm.
